item.title: The Art of Living (Paryiatti)
item.description:
Title: The Art of Living William Hart, The Art of Living, 1987
Vipassana Meditation as taught by S.N. Goenka
https://paminy.com/book-summary-art-living-vipassana-meditation-taught-s-n-goenka/
https://store.pariyatti.org/Art-of-Living-English-Vipassana
This is the classic introduction to Vipassana meditation: a full-length study of the teaching of S. N. Goenka, prepared under his guidance and with his approval. Useful for meditators and non-meditators alike.
This was the first book to appear in English that accurately describes the practice of Vipassana at length for the general reader. It includes stories by Goenkaji as well as answers to students' questions that convey a vivid sense of his teaching.
Hosted on Pariyatti.org
